main event: A witness reported seeing a spot of light, described as yellow, that was moving side to side and appeared to be climbing and moving away.
interesting points: The object was brighter than a star and eventually dimmed.
The witness observed the object for around 10 minutes, with the object blinking occasionally.
The object was spotted through the front windshield of a vehicle near the Fort Carson Officers Club in Colorado.
The sighting was corroborated by the witness's wife who was in the same vehicle.
It was determined that the object was likely a searchlight illumination exercise from Fort Carson, shining on a helium balloon.
sighted object: a spot of light, described as yellow
